admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF035167-CHINA - TA FOR THE CONTAINER
            TRANSPORT PROJECT,TF034590-CHINA - TRANSPORTATION,TF022772-PHRD-CONTAINER TRANSPORT AND TRADE

abstracts.cdata!:
The Container Transport Project aims at
            facilitating inland penetration of seaborne containers from
            gateway ports to inland cities, thus contributing to
            reducing economic disparities between coastal and inland
            areas. There are two main components in this project. First,
            Inland Container Depot (ICD) development aims at developing
            container handling capability at selected inland cities
            located along two pilot corridors. The Bank will finance
            qualified ICDs for their construction and the procurement of
            equipment. Second, upgrading Tianjin Port container handling
            capacity will extend financial assistance to the upgrading
            of container handling equipment at Tianjin Harbor Container
            Company, and providing technical assistance to establish a
            better operational and institutional environment for
            container operations.
